description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Mulletman is a moral man, principled, disciplined, a man of roids and wisdom. Trapped between two worlds, between the eighties and the nineties, he walks the line between the past and the future, between good and gilded robot.
description.short: Mulletman is a moral man, principled, disciplined, a man of roids and wisdom. Trapped between two worlds, between the eighties and the nineties, he walks the line between the past and the future, between good and gilded robot.
